scripts.lint: bun run lint:web && bun run lint:api && bun run lint:py
scripts.lint:fix: bun run lint:web -- --fix && bun run lint:api -- --fix && bun run lint:py:fix
scripts.format: cd apps/web && bun run format && cd ../api && bun run format && cd ../scraper-py && node python-tools.js format
scripts.format:check: cd apps/web && bun run format:check && cd ../api && bun run format:check && cd ../scraper-py && node python-tools.js format:check
scripts.clean: node clean.js && bun pm cache rm
